views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

This wizard to simulate the iPhone X status on a device is not iphone X.

It is quite light and compatible with ios version 11-12

Configure options from Settings.

- Fix anh more Now Update on iOS 13. - If the tweak cannot be customized in the caid set. Please install more Cephei https://repo.packix.com/package/ws.hbang.common/.

- If you have statusbar X errors in some applications, use Insetsxs to customize. https://repo.thuthuatjb.com/index.php?pid=435

- Visit and support me at paypal.me/fahlnbg - add% to battery
- Default buttons
- Fixed some errors
- Add Statusbar ipad
- Turn off and off corner
- Turn off quick app switching
(help rewind video without getting entangled)


- Fix Respring error when stroking Controlcenter
- Add Camera and Flashing
